property.name: CardText
property.value: First F: Add 1 card from your hand to your momentum. R[Your Turn] Discard 1 momentum: After your opponent plays a response ability, cancel its effects.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E[Once Per Turn]: This attack gains Weapon until the end of this turn. E: Name a card type. If your opponent blocks your Weapon attack with the named card type, draw 1 card and your opponent loses 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Remove: Draw 1 card. R Remove: Before the Damage Step of this unblocked attack, reduce this attack's damage to 4.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your opponent blocks this attack with an attack card, they lose 4 vitality. E: If this attack is preceded by a Weapon attack, your opponent loses 2 vitality and cannot play action cards for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is blocked by a non-attack card, add this card to your hand after it resolves. E[Opponent's turn] Lose 4 vitality: Attacks cannot be played for the rest of this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card gets -1 difficulty for each Weapon card preceding it in your card pool. E: If this attack is blocked by a non-attack card, your opponent loses 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: This Weapon attack gets +2 or -2 damage. E Commit: If your opponent attempts to block your attack with a foundation card, their check to block gets -3 and you may draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F Destroy: For the rest of this turn, players cannot play abilities that gain vitality or grant damage penalties. First F Destroy: For the rest of this turn, players cannot play abilities that add cards to their hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E[Your turn, once per turn] Discard 1 Weapon card: Draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Change this attack's speed to 3.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E[Your turn]: Your opponent's checks get -1 for the rest of this turn. E Commit: Your Charge or Slam attack gets +5 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Remove: After your opponent makes a check to play a non-foundation card, that check gets -4. Your next check to play a card gets -4. Failing these checks will not end the Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals 1 damage during the Damage Step. E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent commits 2 foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is not completely blocked, commit your opponent's character.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: This attack gets Stun:X. X equals the number of Charge and Slam keywords on cards in your card pool. E: Seal 2 of your opponent's foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, flip: After your opponent adds any number of cards to their hand due to their effect, flip 1 of their foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy: If your character is committed, both players discard their entire momentum. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your Charge or Slam attack gets +2 speed or +2 damage. If your character is committed, your attack gets Stun:1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy: If your character is committed, commit 1 of your opponent's foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: If your attack is not blocked, it gets +3 damage. R: After your Throw attack deals less than its printed damage, gain 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card does not count towards progressive difficulty. F Add this card to your card pool: For the rest of this turn, after your attack deals damage, flip 1 of your opponent's foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card cannot be discarded from your card pool during the Combat Phase. E: If this attack is blocked, it gets +5 damage. Deadlock E: Your opponent discards 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card cannot be discarded from your card pool during the Combat Phase. E: Your next Throw attack this turn gets +2 damage. If this attack is blocked, your next card gets -2 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card cannot be discarded from your card pool during the Combat Phase. E: This attack gets +1 or -1 damage. If this attack is blocked, gain 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E[Once per turn]: This attack gets +1 or -1 damage. R Destroy: After your opponent's Review Step, add the top card of their discard pile to their hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Flip: After your attack deals less than its printed damage, commit your opponent's character and gain 1 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F Remove: Your opponent reveals their hand and discards 1 action revealed this way. R Commit: After you discard 1 or more cards due to your opponent's effect, draw 1 card and gain 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your Throw attack gets +1 damage for each of your opponent's face down foundations (maximum 3). [Earth] E Destroy: Unflip 1 foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Character cards with "Krieger" in their name can be attached to Heidi as though they share the same name as this character. After you take damage, discard 1 card with "Krieger" in its name attached to this character. First F: Add 1 character with "Krieger" in its name from your hand to your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card ignores progressive difficulty. E: Add 1 character card from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your next Tech attack gets -2 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If your opponent blocks this attack, seal their block. E: This attack gets +1 speed and +1 damage for each character card in your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Add 1 character from your discard pile to the top of your deck. F Flip: Search your deck for 1 character card, reveal it and add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your Tech or Weapon attack gets +2 damage. [Fire] R Commit: After your opponent adds any number of cards to their hand due to their effect, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Remove: Remove 1 of your opponent's assets. R[Your turn] Flip: After you play a character card that you could normally attach to your character, add it to your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your Tech attack cannot be blocked by action cards. R Remove: After you check a 6, add the checked card to your hand. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Destroy: Your next non-attack card gets -3 difficulty (minimum 0). Deadlock E Commit: Your Tech attack gets +3 damage and Throw.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this card is discarded due to your character's effect, add it to the top of your deck. E(5+): Your opponent's block modifier to block this attack gets +1 for each card with "Krieger" in its name attached to your character.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If Heidi has 5 different characters with "Krieger" in their name attached to her, you form "Der Krieger des Todes" and win the game. E: This attack gets +1 or -1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this card is discarded due to your character's effect, discard all cards from your card pool. R[Once per turn] Discard 1 card: Before you would take damage from a blocked attack, if you would take 3 or less damage, reduce its damage to 0.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this card is discarded due to your character's effect, remove 1 card from your opponent's discard pile. F[Once per turn]: Your Tech attacks get -1 difficulty for the rest of this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this card is discarded due to your character's effect, gain 2 vitality. R: After your Tech or Weapon attack deals damage, your opponent loses 1 vitality and you gain 1 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +2 damage for each character in your staging area. E: If this attack deals damage, add 1 character or 1 copy of "Kanonade" from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: After this attack resolves, discard it from your card pool. Your next Tech attack gets +1 speed for each character card in your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: [Fire] E: This attack gets Stun:1. E: This attack gets +1 speed for each Weapon attack and +1 damage for each Tech attack in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Remove, discard 1 character card: After your opponent plays a card as a form, discard it from their card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R[Your turn]: After you play a Ranged attack, your opponent adds 1 of their face up foundations to their card pool and adds the top card of their deck to their staging area face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this card leaves your staging area, both players add the top 2 cards of their deck to their card pool face down. First F Destroy 1 foundation: Your opponent adds 1 face down foundation from their staging area to their card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: If this attack is blocked, your opponent adds 1 foundation from their staging area to their card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Add the top card of your opponent's deck to their card pool face down. E Destroy 1 asset: Destroy 1 of your opponent's assets.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This attack gets -1 difficulty for each card in your opponent's card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your Ranged attack deals damage, add it to your momentum. E Destroy: Your Ranged attack gets +1 damage. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Face down cards do not count towards progressive difficulty to play this card. After you check this card, you may add it to your staging area committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: Before a card would leave your staging area due to your opponent's effect, remove this card instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your Ranged attack gets +1 damage for each card in your opponent's card pool. Deadlock R Commit: After your opponent plays an ability on an asset or foundation, cancel its effects.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E[Your turn] Reveal 2 foundations from your hand: Draw 1 card. E[Once per turn] Reveal 2 attacks from your hand: This attack gets +X or -X damage. X equals this attack's printed damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your staging area, asset cards do not ready during the Ready Step. F Commit: Commit 1 non-character card in your opponent's staging area. If your character's hand size is less than your opponent's, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If your character's printed hand size is less than your opponent's, this attack gets -2 difficulty. E Reveal 1 card from your hand: This attack gains all keywords and their rating printed on the revealed card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Reveal 2 foundations from your hand: This attack gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E Reveal 2 foundations from your hand: This attack gets +1 speed and +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E[Your turn] Flip: If your opponent has more foundations than you, they add 1 of their foundations to their card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this card is revealed from your hand during the Enhance Step, your attack gets +1 speed. E: Add this card to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E[Once per turn] Reveal 1 attack or foundation from your hand: If the top card of your discard pile shares the same name as the revealed card, add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After this card is revealed from your hand during the Enhance Step, your attack gets +1 damage. E Add this card to your hand: Commit 1 of your opponent's foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F Reveal 1 Ally card from your hand: Your opponent discards 1 card. R(5+): After your Flash attack resolves, commit 1 of your opponent's foundations or ready 1 foundation that has not been readied this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you play this attack, your next Flash attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you play this attack, it loses Flash and gets Multiple:X. X equals the number of Flash attacks that have been played this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If your opponent does not attempt to block this attack, they discard 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is blocked, ready 1 asset or foundation that has not been readied this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R(4+): After you play a Flash attack, it gets +1 damage.)

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your Flash attack resolves, your opponent commits 2 foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you play an attack, change its zone. R Remove: After you play an attack, it gets +1 damage for every 2 foundations in your opponent's staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Cards cannot leave your discard pile or staging area due to effects for the rest of this turn. Your next Flash attack gets Safe for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First E Remove the top card of your deck: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals the printed difficulty of the removed card. E[Once per turn]: If your printed 6 difficulty attack's damage is at least double its printed damage, draw 2 cards.

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Remove: After you make a check to play a printed 6 difficulty card, your check gets +3.

property.name: CardText

property.value: R: After you are dealt damage, draw 1 card. E Remove the top 8 cards of your deck from the game: Your attack gets +2 damage and +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your next block this turn gets Breaker: 1. R Remove, discard 1 momentum: After your opponent plays a non-foundation card, they cannot play copies of that card for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: When a player would ready foundations during their Ready Step, they choose and ready half of those foundations (rounded up) instead. E [Once per turn] Commit 1 foundation: Your punch attack gets Stun: 3. You may change its zone to any other.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you play this card, draw 1 card. After your opponent's Ready Step, ready this foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 card played as a block from your card pool: This attack gets -2 speed. R Destroy, lose 2 vitality: After your opponent plays an ability on their character for the second time or greater this turn add the top card of their deck to their card pool face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your attack deals damage, both players lose 2 vitality. E Commit, discard 1 card: Discard the top 4 cards of your deck. Add 1 foundation discarded this way to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: This attack gets Safe until the end of the turn. E [Your Turn] Destroy: Draw 1 card. Only playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Card Pool] Commit your character: After your opponent plays a response ability, cancel its effects.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R [Card Pool] Commit your character: After your opponent plays their second enhance this Enhance Step, commit their character.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First E [Once per turn] (X+): If your non-throw attack is completely blocked, your opponent loses X vitality. X equals this attack's printed damage. R Commit: After your opponent plays an attack, reduce its speed to 0. If you block that attack, add the card you blocked with to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Remove, commit 2 foundations: Add the top card of your opponent's deck to their card pool face down. E Destroy 2 committed foundations: Add this card to your staging area face down. You may shuffle up to 3 cards from your discard pile into your deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, add 1 attack from your card pool to your staging area face down: Add 1 Ranged attack from your card pool to your hand. You cannot play attacks from your hand for the rest of this turn. E [Once per turn]: Your Ranged attack gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your enhance ability is canceled by your opponent's effect, commit 2 foundations in their staging area. First E [Your attack] Commit, discard 1 momentum: Draw 1 card and gain 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First E Commit: Your attack gets +2 speed. Only playable if you have at least 1 face down card in your card pool. R Destroy: After your opponent plays an ability on an action card, cancel its effect and discard it from the card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy 1 foundation with a difficulty of 3 or more: After a response ability is played, cancel its effects. F: Add 1 Ally card from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card cannot leave the card pool due to effects. E: Reduce this attack's speed to 0. The next card you play this turn gains Breaker:2. R: After your opponent plays an enhance during your attack's Enhance Step, your attack gets +3 speed and you gain 1 vitality.
